sn8.6:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn8.6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto bhikkhu dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti poriya vacaya vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya.
sn8.6:1.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn8.6:1.5: “ayam kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti poriya vacaya vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya.
sn8.6:1.6: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn8.6:1.7: Yannunaham ayasmantam sariputtam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
sn8.6:2.1: Atha kho ayasma vangiso utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yenayasma sariputto tenanjalim panametva ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn8.6:2.2: “patibhati mam, avuso sariputta, patibhati mam, avuso sariputta”ti.
sn8.6:2.4: Atha kho ayasma vangiso ayasmantam sariputtam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
